title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Mar 30 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Mar 30 2022
description:
Karol Markowicz of the New York Post joins Clay and Buck to discuss the teachers union control over covid restrictions, the Hunter Biden story, Dr. Fauci -- and she predicts blue states will return to mask mandates. The Washington Post and CNN suddenly the discover the Hunter Biden story. Why now? Will Joe Biden pardon his son?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
